file.name: petstore.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v1
paths:
  /testingThatInParameterCanBeSetToPath: 
    get:
      operationId: listPets
      tags:
        - pets
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: path
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A paged array of pets
          headers:
            $ref: 'components.yaml#/components/parameters/ResponseHeader' # works as expected
          content:
            application/json:    
              schema:
                $ref: "components.yaml#/components/schemas/Pet"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "components.yaml#/components/schemas/Error"
  /pets2:
    get:
      operationId: listPetsAgain
      tags:
        - pets
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A paged array of pets
          headers:
            $ref: 'components.yaml#/components/parameters/ResponseHeader' # becomes pointer to: "#/paths/~1pets/get/responses/default/content/application~1json/schema"
          content:
            application/json:    
              schema:
                $ref: "components.yaml#/components/schemas/Pet"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "components.yaml#/components/schemas/Error"
  /pets3:
    get:
      operationId: listPetsAgain
      tags:
        - pets
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A paged array of pets
          headers:
            $ref: 'components2.yaml#/components/parameters/ResponseHeader' # works as expected
          content:
            application/json:    
              schema:
                $ref: "components2.yaml#/components/schemas/Pet"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "components2.yaml#/components/schemas/Error"

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!str `compone...` into ogen.Parameter; yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!str `compone...` into ogen.Parameter; yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!str `compone...` into ogen.Parameter
